text: Luciano García Alén (1928 - 16 October 2015) was a Spanish physician, researcher and ethnographer. He was known for studying the Galician culture. He was born in Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain. Alén died in Santiago de Compostela, Galicia, Spain, aged 87.Muere a los 87 años el médico y etnógrafo Luciano García Alén ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Spain Category:People from Pontevedra Category:Spanish physicians Category:Spanish scientists
title: Luciano García Alén
